name: TWExtension
description: build/release task to Run UI test with Testingwhiz
author: Cygnet Infotech

inputs.name: serverURL
inputs.label: Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL of the TestingWhiz Automation server in the format http://host:port/.

inputs.name: baseURL
inputs.label: Base URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: TestingWhiz BASEURL should starts with http://www... or https://www... .

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Script Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script source: File Path or Folder Path.

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the TestingWhiz automation script file.

inputs.name: folderPath
inputs.label: Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the TestingWhiz automation script Folder.

inputs.name: reportDploy
inputs.label: Report Deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for to save the TestingWhiz Report.

inputs.name: browser
inputs.label: Browser
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the browser you wish to run the script on.

inputs.name: stepExecutionInterval
inputs.label: Step Execution Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Interval between steps in milliseconds(to avoid errors if your site is slow).

inputs.name: reportInterval
inputs.label: Report Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum time taken by any case of this script when executed in TestingWhiz tool. Value should be in milliseconds.

inputs.name: passFailPer
inputs.label: Pass '%'
inputs.helpMarkDown: Approved Passing Percentage for task to be succeed

inputs.name: captureFailureScreenshot
inputs.label: Capture Failure Screenshot
inputs.helpMarkDown: It will capture screenshot of failed Test Step.

inputs.name: captureConditionFailureScreenshot
inputs.label: Capture Condition Failure Screenshot
inputs.helpMarkDown: It will capture screenshot when conditional test step returns false.
